mapper.sql: a.dictionary_item_id, a.dictionary_id, a.value, a.text, a.sort, a.parent_id
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dictionary_item a join sys_dictionary b on a.dictionary_id=b.dictionary_id where a.dictionary_id= #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

from sys_dictionary_item a join sys_dictionary b on a.dictionary_id=b.dictionary_id

update sys_dictionary_item
dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dictionary_item_id = #{dictionaryItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
